price: On that Day no human or jinn will be asked about his sin[11].
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
footnotes: [11] For Allah knows their sins; they will only be interrogated as a form of punishment.
